# Code to extract headers from Rmarkdown file
```{r library}
library(mindr)
```

# Define file path
```{r file_path}
path = "/Users/nicholas/Documents/Projects/ACQDIV/VariationSets/Cognition/second_revision/Analysis/"
```

# Extract headers
```{r extract_headers}
outline = outline(path = path, remove_curly_bracket = TRUE)
```

# Write the headers
```{r write_headers}
cat(outline, file = "./headers.txt", sep="\n")
```
